# Coverage File Paths for Files View Feature (Branch: Skyline/work/20251126_files_view)
#
# This file lists ALL .cs files added by this branch for coverage analysis.
# Files excluded from coverage (tests, auto-generated, dev tools) are commented out.
# This file is located with TODO-20251126_files_view.md and moves with it through
# the TODO lifecycle (active → completed → archive).
#
# The Analyze-Coverage.ps1 script uses Extract-TypeNames.ps1 to extract fully-qualified
# type names (Namespace.ClassName) from the uncommented .cs files listed below, then
# measures coverage for those exact types in the coverage JSON.
#
# Total files added by branch: 35
# Included in coverage: 28 production code files
# Excluded: 4 test files, 2 auto-generated resources, 1 designer file

# ============================================================================
# PRODUCTION CODE - INCLUDED IN COVERAGE ANALYSIS (28 files)
# ============================================================================
